docs.lead_paragraph: International A3-17 CONOCO DROPS IRAN DEAL Conoco will not proceed with its agreement to develop two offshore oilfields for Iran after the White House announced that President Clinton would issue a directive barring all such transactions. A1 CARLOS SALINAS'S SIDE Carlos Salinas, the Mexican ex-President said to have been forced into exile by his successor, has popped up in New York, eager to dismiss that version of events. A1
